sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' export default function Header({title}) { const [user, setUser] = useState("") const [folderImage, setFolderImage] = useState("") useEffect(() => { const info = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("userAuth")) setUser(info.user) setFolderImage(`${process.env.REACT_APP_SEVER_IP}:${process.env.REACT_APP_PORT}/uploads/`) }, []) return (

{title}

{ user.lastName }
) }
